skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: night meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Night Meditation is the Alexa skill that offers guided sessions to help you relax and transition effortlessly into a state of calm and peaceful meditation under the quiet of the night. With over 10 unique sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and a variety of soothing voices paired with tranquil background sounds, this skill is designed to prepare your mind and body for restful and rejuvenating meditation.

⭐ PREMIUM FEATURES ⭐

• Guided sessions with professional, calming voices
• A selection of background sounds crafted for deep nighttime relaxation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated programs to enhance your meditation practice
• Full access to all session lengths

We value your feedback to help us continuously improve and provide the ultimate nighttime meditation experience.

Enjoy your journey to serene and peaceful nights!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
